name: V.I.R.U.S
description:
Just A Very Small Game . Survive , Earn Points ......  Will Release A Update Soon . With Some New Things :D And This Is My First Finished Game. Check The Credits In Main Menu For Controls. 

Use Right Shift To Dash Into Enemies To Earn Points. Each Enemy Will Give Different Point And  Also Each Enemy Will Give Different Damage To You . Enjoy! :D 

Made By B_MARK . I Am New To Game Dev. Sorry For Any Optimization Problem . I Am Learning New Stuff Day By Day. :D

Update #1 -  Now Here You Have To Find Hidden Cores . After You Find All Cores You Will Win The Game . Oh What Sound Pretty Easy ? Guess What They Are Invisible. Until You Get Close To Them They Will Not Be Visible. If You Find Any Just Touch It To Update Your CORE Counter. Also Added Some Minor Things . Good Luck:D

Music From : - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com and  https://www.zapsplat.com
